name: Leonardo Ferreira
body:
I'm currently a graduate student at the Instituto de Matemática Estatística e Física of Universidade Federal do Rio Grande. I work under supervision of [Dr. Fabricio Ferrari](www.ferrari.pro.br) in Extragalactic Astronomy with focus in Galaxy Morphology. 

I'm also a member of the Grupo de Astrofísica Teórica e Computacional, a multidisciplinary research group that brings astrophysics, cosmology, statistics and computation together. 

Feel free checkout my to Lattes (Brizilian academic CV plataform) and my research work and goals.
